Description: a study identifier for each experimental group within a study
Levels: Identifier variable - author, year of publication, experimental group

Description: the drug administered in the experiment
the number of animals affected by the outcome measure in the control group
the number of animals affected by the outcome measure in the treatment group
the number of animals in the control group
the number of animals in the treatment group
the outcome measured in the animals
reporting of blinded assessment of outcome
reporting of blinded induction of ischaemia (stroke)
the method used for middle cerebral artery occlusion (mcao) to induce stroke
reporting of random allocation of animals to treatment or control groups
reporting of a sample size calculation
the sex of the animals used in the experiment
the comorbidity suffered by the animals
the dose of the drug administered to the animals
the unit of the drug dose administered to the animals
the time of the drug administration, relative to stroke induction, in minutes
the time the outcome was assessed, relative to stroke induction, in hours
